definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Carnap tried to define causality from the angle of semantics.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾納普試圖從語義學角度來定義因果必然性。

sentences.english: At last, it point out the correlation between the Kripke"semantics and his reference theory."
sentences.chinese: 最後指出了克里普克語義學與其指稱理論的關聯。

sentences.english: Structural semantics deals with implicational lexical relations.
sentences.chinese: 結構語義學研究含蓄的語義關係。

sentences.english: Componential analysis is a semantic approach to explaining lexical meaning.
sentences.chinese: 語義成分分析是一種解釋詞義的語義學方法。

sentences.english: Chapter two comes to game-theoretical semantics.
sentences.chinese: 第二章着重討論了博弈論語義學。

sentences.english: The, controversial essential about the origin of law is only a semantics dissension.
sentences.chinese: 法起源問題的爭論實質只是語義學上的分岐。

sentences.english: Situation description is the kernel and basis of the situation-based lexical semantics.
sentences.chinese: 情境描述是基於情境的詞彙語義學的核心和基礎。

sentences.english: Furthermore, semantic slant of neutral terms was discovered as a common multi-lingual phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 中性詞語義偏移是當代語義學的一個關注點。

sentences.english: The logical area of the dictionary in which word semantics are implemented.
sentences.chinese: 詞語義學被實施字典的邏輯區域。

sentences.english: Calculations that require strict floating-point semantics should be handled on the server side.
sentences.chinese: 需要嚴格遵守浮點語義學的計算應當在服務器端處理。

sentences.english: This distinguished syntax from phonology and semantics.
sentences.chinese: 這使句法學有別於音位學和語義學。

sentences.english: Quine: One reason is a strategy that I call semantic ascent.
sentences.chinese: 一個原因是我稱之爲“語義學追溯”的戰略。

sentences.english: While much of this boils down to semantics, your choice of words are critical.
sentences.chinese: 歸根到底就是語義學，你所選擇的語句是至關重要的。

sentences.english: Philosophical semantics is too abstruse to understand.
This is all because pragmatics has been neglected by semantic analysis.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲語義學分析置語用學於不顧。

sentences.english: The semantics of the future desktop will be open-ended.
sentences.chinese: 未來桌面的語義學將是完全開放的。
